caption:
This photograph depicts a lively night-time scene at an outdoor snack kiosk. The kiosk features a classic design, with a striped awning in red and white and warm lighting that creates a welcoming ambiance. The vendor, standing inside the kiosk, is engaging with two customers. The male vendor, who wears glasses and a dark shirt, smiles as he interacts with the customers.

In the foreground, a man with his back to the camera is ordering food. He is wearing blue jeans and a light yellow sweater. Facing the vendor, a woman with dark hair neatly styled, appears slightly blurred as she leans towards the counter, indicating motion or laughter during the conversation.

The surrounding environment has the ambiance of a festive or market-like setting, with other food options and possibly additional vendors out of frame. There is a small tree illuminated by ambient lighting that contributes to the overall cozy and social night-time atmosphere. The scene conveys a sense of casual interaction and enjoyment, typical of a food market or fair.
title: Old fashioned popcorn wagon is a favorite stop on nicollet mall
